document.full_text: a u.s. federal court judge has allowed deutsche bank ag and the mortgage unit of france's bnp paribas sa to proceed with their lawsuits against bank of america related to losses they incurred in connection with the collapse of mortgage lender taylor bean & whittaker mortgage corp.
document.title: judge allows suits against bofa to proceed
lines_and_colors: a u.s. federal court judge has allowed deutsche bank ag and the mortgage unit of france's bnp paribas sa to proceed with their lawsuits against bank of america related to losses they incurred in connection with the collapse of mortgage lender taylor bean & whittaker mortgage corp.
